title: Big Faith, Big Mission
speaker: Pastor Pastor Arthur Goncalves
desc:
Speaker: Pastor Pastor Arthur Goncalves

Pastor Arthur will be sharing with us the vision and mission for a Church replant that the Lord has called His family to in Lake Mary, Longwood , Sanford Florida. 

For more information on the replant you can follow Relaunch Lighthouse at:
https://www.facebook.com/Relaunch-Lighthouse-139016466768597/

visit the website:
www.lighthouselakemary.com

Official Lighthouse Facebook Page:
https://www.facebook.com/LBCLakeMary/
